item.title: Infrastructure as Code and Calm Blueprints
item.description: This Calm.io blog recap was originally written and posted by me on November 3, 2015 at http://calm.io/2015/11/03/infrastructure-as-code-and-calm-blueprints/, and slightly enhanced on February 18, 2018.
